name: Silicone Elastomer Powder and Emulsion SiCare® 2117
description: As a compound of large-molecular-weight cross-linking silicone elastomer powder and talc, Silicone Elastomer Powder and Emulsion SiCare® 2117 can provide delicate and soft smoothness to skin; absorb skin sebum, conquer facial shiny oil, enhance refreshing feel and makeup persistence; can cover fine lines, smoothen the skin, reduce stickiness of a product, improve the sense of use of a product making a makeup effect more fitting and natural when added in it; excellent matte effect, easy to disperse, as a multi-functional ingredient, can create better experience for formulation, provide solutions, widely applied for various cosmetics, especially for loose powder, pressed powder, eye shadow and blush and so on.
